title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in different formats when using a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from a table should be displayed in the same format regardless of whether it is used in a dynamic text item or a data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Insert a dynamic text item or a data/text item. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them using the dynamic text item or the data/text item.
